address: Xã Tịnh An, Thành phố Quảng Ngãi, Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi
thought:
**Analyzing the Administrative Restructuring in Quảng Ngãi: A Deep Dive**

Okay, so the user wants me to identify the new administrative unit for the old address "Xã Tịnh An, Thành phố Quảng Ngãi, Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi." No problem, I'll break this down. First, the province is Quảng Ngãi, that's straightforward. Now, the key is digging through those resolutions and cross-referencing with the provided ward data.

I initially checked the relevant province resolutions, confirming that the province name itself remains "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi." The meat of the matter lies in resolution 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically its section on administrative restructuring in Quảng Ngãi.

Line 82 is the golden nugget here. It states quite clearly that "Xã Tịnh An" is being merged with "phường Trương Quang Trọng," along with Tịnh Ấn Tây and Tịnh Ấn Đông, to form a new ward also named "phường Trương Quang Trọng."  I double-checked this by scanning through the other listed mergers in the same resolution and confirming that the other units didn't include Tịnh An, and checking line 92 also confirmed Tịnh An was, in fact, included in the consolidation.

My analysis of the "New wards" data confirms this. There's a listing for "phường Trương Quang Trọng" with the province name Quảng Ngãi. This perfectly aligns with the resolution. I also went through the other entries in the "New wards" data, just to be thorough. "phường Cẩm Thành" is present, but I see no mention of "Tịnh An" in that new unit.

Therefore, the old address "Xã Tịnh An, Thành phố Quảng Ngãi, Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi" is now part of the new ward, "phường Trương Quang Trọng."  This is a confident conclusion, backed by explicit wording in resolution 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15 and a corresponding entry in the new ward data.  The province name hasn't changed.

citation.header: 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Quảng Ngãi
citation.line: 82. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của phường Trương Quang Trọng và các xã Tịnh Ấn Tây, Tịnh Ấn Đông, Tịnh An thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Trương Quang Trọng.
